p:
For CHIKV we used a slightly different approach as it is an alpha virus. Previously, Akahata et al.
22 , demonstrated that HIV reporter particles pseudotyped with CHIKV Env generate a specific and sensitive RVP system that can be used for neutralizing antibody detection. To develop CHIKV RVPs, pcDNA3.1 vector expressing the Env region was co-transfected with HIV NL.LucR-E- vector to generate luciferase expressing CHIKV pseudotyped RVPs. Once again, infection of Vero cells in the presence of serial dilutions of CHIKV RVPs showed a dose dependent luciferase signal (Supplementary Fig.Â 2D ).
